p: Because virus cannot reproduce or shows metabolism outside a host cell, it is not considered an organism, but rather particles, which are coated with a protein or lipid capsid. As for the genetic material, they are divided into double or single stranded DNA viruses, or RNA, single or double stranded viruses ( 30). Viruses listed as a public health emergency by the WHO, Ebola virus, influenza, COVID-19, poliomyelitis and yellow fever, are all single stranded RNA viruses ( 35â€“ 41).
